summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3988 for the improvement of Pilgrim Street, from Rainier Avenue to Waters Avenue, by constructing concrete sidewalks on the south side and and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 48528, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
